version_description: -fixes missing lesson audio tracks

-improved compatibility with iOS 8, iPhone 6 and 6+
-switch language button added to the Home and Settings screens for easy access
-improvements to the download manager
-other various bugfixes and improvements

-added a button on the Settings screen to Manage Subscriptions
-fixed some PDF display issues in landscape mode
-other minor fixes and improvements

-when browsing lessons, you can now filter lessons by type: audio, video, and newest
-by popular demand, we've added some very useful audio player control enhancements: change playback speed (0.5x, 1x, 1.5x, or 2x), quickly skip back and forward 10 seconds, go to the next or previous track within a lesson, and set a track to repeat
-fixed some PDF display issues
-added a Manage Subscriptions button to the Settings screen for easy access to your subscriptions
-better support for Control Center
-various other bugfixes and under the hood improvements

-fixed the missing progress bar for seasons in My Library
-fixed some crashes under iOS 6

****iOS 6 USERS PLEASE NOTE: This will be the final version to support iOS 6. Versions after this will require iOS 7 or higher****
-fixed a crash on iOS 7 when attempting to choose any language from the "All 31 Languages" list on the language selection screen

-NEW: Yearly subscriptions are now available! Save big by subscribing for a year at a time.
-improved Voice Over support
-various other bugfixes and improvements

-NEW: Improved support for Premium Plus subscribers. Purchase a monthly or yearly Premium Plus subscription right in the app or login to your existing account. On top of all the great features that come with a Premium subscription, enjoy access to a more personalized learning experience including 1 on 1 instruction with our teachers with the My Teacher feature
-various other bugfixes and improvements

-NEW LANGUAGES! Now study Afrikaans, Romanian and Urdu, too!
-various other bugfixes and improvements

***PLEASE NOTE: we are aware of the crash on startup you may experience if you're running iOS 7. This has been fixed in version 1.11.1. In the meantime, we strongly recommend upgrading to iOS 8 or above if possible.***
-fixed a startup crash on iOS 7 introduced in v1.11

-NEW: Premium users can now view, edit, and sync their Word Bank with their respective 101 site. To add words to your Word Bank, browse to the Vocabulary section of any lesson and tap on the + button next to the word to add it. To all all the lesson's vocabulary words, tap on the + button in the upper right of the screen.
-NEW: Premium Plus users can now record and submit audio recordings to their teachers.
-other various bugfixes and improvements

-NEW: Text magnification for vocabulary, expansion, and line-by-line. To set your font size, just go More->Settings->Text Size (or on iPad Settings->Text Size) and adjust the slider to set your desired text size.
-FIXED: an issue that could cause the app to crash when users with a very large number of words in their word bank try to login.
-FIXED: the microphone was inaccessible for iPad users to use for My Teacher recordings.
-FIXED: lots of optimizations and improvement to the Word Bank.
-Various other bugfixes and improvements.

-NEW: Auto play! Have you ever wanted to listen to one lesson after another without having to manually start the next audio track playing each time? Now you can! Just start an audio track playing and then hit the new Auto Play button. The app will automatically play the next audio track until it hits the end of the current series. Don't want to hear the review track? Only want to hear the dialog tracks? You can configure which types of audio tracks are auto played on the Settings screen. Auto play is great for commuters and others whose hands may be busy while they listen.
-FIXED: improvements to accessibility features
-FIXED: various other bugfixes and improvements

-NEW: view your time spent studying in the app on the website
-FIXED: various smaller bugfixes and fixes for iOS 10

NEW: Get unlimited mobile access to a language for a one time payment with the new Lifetime Mobile in-app purchase. ***Please note that Lifetime Mobile does NOT include access to the corresponding website. Lifetime Mobile purchases are on a per language basis***
FIXED: an issue that could cause some downloaded PDFs to not open
FIXED: many other various bugfixes

FIXED: the information for the new Lifetime Mobile subscription on the Upgrade screen mistakenly stated that it includes access to My Teacher. It does NOT. The information and slides on this screen have been corrected. We're very sorry for any confusion this caused.

NEW: proper support for larger screen sizes.
NEW: multitasking is now available on supported iPads. Use the Innovative Language 101 app alongside other apps in Split View or Slide Over modes.
NEW: picture in picture is now available for video lessons on supported iPads.
NEW: you can now pull down on the lesson browser screens to manually refresh lesson content.
FIXED: headphone controls now work correctly for play/pause, fast forward, rewind, and previous & next track for both wired headphones and for AirPods.
FIXED: we greased some gears to make the app snappier all around
FIXED: a more accurate progress bar on the Downloads screen for lessons being downloaded.
FIXED: an assortment of various other bugfixes and improvements to keep things running smoothly.
FIXED: various bugfixes and improvements

FIXED: an issue that could cause some wrong audio files to play when certain lessons are downloaded.
FIXED: an issue that could prevent words from being added to the word bank.
FIXED: various bugfixes including a memory leak.
FIXED: various bugfixes and improvements

FIXED: an issue that could cause some wrong audio files to play when certain lessons are downloaded.
FIXED: an issue that could prevent words from being added to the word bank.
FIXED: various bugfixes including a memory leak.

-Some changes for compliance with the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)
-Various other bugfixes
-Various bugfixes

-FIXED: an issue that would cause vocabulary to become corrupted when downloaded.
-NEW: added a 1.25x speed option for audio playback.
small bugfixes

-NEW: video player now supports subtitles. When playing a video that has subtitles available, you'll find a new button in the top right of the screen where you can select your subtitle options. You can also turn subtitles and closed captioning on and off from the app's Settings screen.
-NEW: offline Word Bank support
-NEW: when registering for an account, if you mistype your email address we can catch that and offer to correct it for you.
-NEW: better support for larger devices screens such as the iPhone XS, XR, and newer iPads.
-IMPROVED: better security.
-FIXED: the file size of some lessons was displayed incorrectly.
-FIXED: a bug that could prevent opening the Word Bank on iPad if the Word Bank was empty.
-FIXED: a bug that could prevent users from switching languages
-FIXED: other various bugfixes and improvements
small bugfixes

- NEW: revamped Lesson Library. The Lesson Library is now more powerful and easier to use. Set your level and access your level's Learning Path right from the top of the Lesson Library.
